column4: Outbound Clays Mill Rd at Keithshire Way
column5: A pedestrian is reportedly involved.  Outbound Clays Mill Rd is shutdown with traffic diverted to Keithshire Way.

column5: Expect long delays due to work on the Clays Ferry Bridge.  One lane is blocked on the bridge.
